Content.Text: (The wind, coming from an unknown direction, carries fallen leaves, shakes the branches, and makes a rustling sound.)

(In your mind, there is chaos, and your head throbs painfully, yet your body is enveloped in an inexplicable warmth. The sunlight filtering through the shade of trees still causes a stinging sensation in your eyes. You attempt to look around, but the surroundings feel nothing but unfamiliar to you.)
(Doubts continue to surge in your mind. You don't know where to begin with your questions, nor do you know where to find the answers. You stare blankly at the swirling leaves, lost in thought.)
(After some time, your mind seems to regain a bit of clarity. You attempt to recall something, not expecting to remember everything, but hoping for something simple, like your name.)
